TopicTitle: Event Horizon Telescope published its findings on 3C 279

Articles.Content:
https://eventhorizontelescope.org/blog/something-is-lurking-in-the-heart-of-quasar-3c-279

Definitely an interesting read, although I'll have to admit I don't understand, like, a quarter of it. In short, it seems that 3C 279, a quasar 5 billion light years away, is quite different to what we knew about it so far!
